channel.title: Anthology on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Anthology on Strat

item.title: Screaming Planet
item.description: In Screaming Planet, Jodorowsky collaborates with artists recommended to him by his publisher on short comics with 10 pages or less very loosely related to a flaming planetary object flying through space. The art styles of each short comic are varied as you can imagine, and some are surprisingly good.

item.title: Across The Wounded Galaxies - Interviews With Contemporary American Science Fiction Writers
item.description: Interviews with a bunch of science fiction writers. It’s great if you’re interested in getting to know your favorite author’s perspective or if you’re interested in getting recommendations from them.
